DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers blood chemistry value within normal range Age : 1835 year BMI : 1925 kg/m2 Pregnancy lactation Alcohol and/or drug abuse Use dietary supplement medication , except contraceptive Any known malignant , metabolic endocrine diseases Previous cardiac infarction Dementia Participation clinical trial within past 6 week prior recruitment Smoking Physical activity 5 h/wk
